to.sven.androidrccar.host.accessorycommunication.command

Interface ICommandListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAccessoryCommunicationListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccessoryCommunication

    public interface ICommandListener
extends IAccessoryCommunicationListener
    This interface is used to connect the AccessoryCommunication with the implementors of AbstractCommand. The commands implementations can streams for the communication with the µController and call the IAccessoryCommunicationListener when a response is received. The AccessoryCommunication does thereby post back handling to the main thread (UI thread).
    Author:
    sven
